review: Finally replaced my 2-year+ Roku with Amazon's Fire TV. What a difference in display, performance and usability! I love that since I am "Prime" member, I did not have to register. The reason I rated 4 versus 5 stars is beause of the problem loading Netfilx. I tried several times without sucess, could not find information in Help. So, I finally googled the issue and found a forum that instructed me to Settings and download update. It seems like a better way to handle this known issue, versus having customers clog Amazon help desk or seek outside, Internet forums. Otherwise, I am jazzed about this product!
author: Greenie

review: So far it's been great.  The only thing I don't care for is that it doesn't have a power switch on it.  I don't like wasting the energy when it isn't in use and unplugging it is kind of a pain.  I think Amazon's intent is for you to keep it on all the time, but that's not what I prefer.
